title: Chapter 4335 - Chapter 4335: 4334 Demonic Fiend’S Fortuitous Encounter And Breakthrough
body:
Chapter 4335 - Chapter 4335: 4334 Demonic Fiend’S Fortuitous Encounter And Breakthrough

Chapter 4335: 4334 Demonic Fiend’s fortuitous encounter and breakthrough

Translator: 549690339

“Great Dao level, demonic human, an embryo with darkness attribute!”

In the Great Dao of Heaven, Wang Xian looked at the embryo in front of him. His eyes were sparkling.

According to Saint Shan Tian, Song Ta, and the rest.

This embryo with darkness attribute could at the very least nurture an expert who had just entered the Heaven’s origin realm.

It was normal to nurture an existence at the control level.

If they could fuse perfectly, they would be able to nurture an existence at the Great Dao level.

However, it was too difficult to obtain it perfectly.

In the embryo, the demon didn’t have any attributes yet, but if his life was threatened, the demon would resist.

In fact, he would even fight to the death!

Once the embryo was destroyed, the embryo wouldn’t be perfect.

It wouldn’t be able to inherit everything from the demon.

In other words, the more perfect the embryo was, the more inheritance it would receive from the demon.

If it was completely obtained, it would be equivalent to possessing the demon.

“If it’s possession of the embryo, the Dragon Palace’s darkness attributes would be fine. However, overall, the venom horned dragon species is the most suitable.”

Wang Xian thought to himself.

The poisonous horned dragon species had a terrifying innate ability when it came to possession.

When the poisonous horned dragon species possessed an embryo, it was much stronger than the other darkness attribute divine dragons!

He was prepared to let the demonic fiend possess this embryo.

However, although the poisonous horned dragon species had a special ability when it came to possession, Wang Xian was still unsure if the demonic fiend was able to possess it perfectly.

If there was even the slightest mistake, the embryo would be destroyed!

It would not be able to completely obtain everything that belonged to the demonic humans!

A perfect possession was the most important thing!

How to achieve a perfect fusion was an extremely difficult task.

“Demonic Fiend, come out First!”

Wang Xian came to the side of the primal Chaos Stone and called out the demonic fiend who was cultivating inside!

Mo Sha now possessed the strength of a ruler at the peak of the realm.

There was still a gap between him and the Heaven’s origin blessed realm.

In the Dragon Palace, the purebred divine dragons were the easiest to break through to the Heaven’s origin blessed realm.

It was actually very difficult for a purebred dragon like the poisonous horned dragon to break through.

This required great opportunities and good fortune.

“Dragon King!”

Upon receiving Wang Xian’s call, Mo sha immediately flew out and greeted him respectfully!

“Yes!”

Wang Xian nodded his head, he looked at the embryo in front of him and said, “There is a huge good fortune here. I am prepared to give it to you. This is the embryo of a Great Dao level heaven origin creator. If you can possess him, you will be able to possess everything about him!”

“However, the embryo is alive. Once it awakens, there is a possibility of a life-and-death battle. He is very weak now and you can easily suppress him. However, it is still a little difficult to obtain it perfectly. Take a look and see what the chances of obtaining it perfectly are!”

“HMM?”

Mo Sha was slightly shocked when he heard Wang Xian’s words. Following that, his eyes lit up. “It’s the Dragon King. Thank you for your nurturing, Your Majesty.”

Mo Sha immediately knelt down and bowed to Wang Xian.

Wang Xian waved his hand and allowed him to sense the embryo in front of him.

Mo Sha placed his palm on the embryo and sensed it quietly.

“Dragon King, this embryo is only at the eighth level of the Universe Overlord realm. However…”

Mo sha sensed it and frowned slightly. “There is a very strong soul power and a very strong pressure inside him. I have the confidence to possess him, but the soul and pressure inside may cause some interference to me!”

“Yes!”

Wang Xian heard his words and frowned slightly. “You have no way to completely resist the soul and pressure inside? Do you have the confidence to possess him 100% ?”

“Dragon King, I don’t have such confidence. In fact, if I were to possess it, I would definitely encounter resistance!”

Mo Sha shook his head!

Wang Xian nodded his head and looked deep in thought.

This was indeed a problem.

The situation at that time was also a thorny problem in the eyes of the song tower’s carefree sect’s patriarch and the other Great Dao experts.

They couldn’t obtain everything about this embryo perfectly!

This was because the will of a great dao level expert was extremely terrifying!

Even if he were to make a move himself, it was possible for him to fail!

Not to mention letting a weakling make a move!

Wang Xian looked at this embryo and kept pondering.

A few hours later, his gaze focused slightly.

He recalled the time when he approached the primal chaos stone. The Primal Chaos Stone could devour him directly.

It could melt his consciousness and everything.

In other words, it could completely melt him!

Then, could it be possible to use the primal chaos stone?

“The Primal Chaos Stone is one point, and so is the power of Chaos!”

“What if I use the power of Chaos to assist the Demonic Fiend?”

The more Wang Xian thought about it, the more he felt that there was a high chance of success.

The Primal Chaos Stone at that time could absorb everything.

Even a powerful tree of chaos was absorbed by it until it withered!

This was the power of the primal Chaos Stone, and it was also the power of the power of chaos.

In that case, if he placed the demonic fiend inside the primal chaos stone, would it be able to fuse perfectly with the help of the power of Chaos?

“Let me perform a divination first!”

Wang Xian narrowed his eyes slightly and took out the lamp of divination!

This lamp of divination was indeed a rare treasure at times.

With a thought, Wang Xian performed an ordinary divination.

Under normal circumstances, if he were to possess, how many inheritances of the embryo would he be able to possess.

Very soon, the lamp of divination gave an answer.

30% .

“30% ? For an expert of the Great Dao realm to possess 30% , it’s equivalent to the control level!”

Wang Xian mumbled.

Following that, his body moved and brought the demonic embryo into the primal Chaos Stone!

After entering, Wang Xian continued to perform divination.

With the help of his own power of chaos, the demonic embryo’s possession talent was sealed by the primal chaos stone.

Under such circumstances, how much could he obtain?

Wang Xian thought to himself as the lamp of divination was burning rapidly.

The result appeared very quickly — 90% .

This result made Wang Xian’s eyes freeze.

He was pleasantly surprised but also a little disappointed.

90% was already very high.

However, he was still a little short of 100% !

“What’s the reason? Is it because the demonic fiend doesn’t possess the power of chaos, so it can’t achieve a perfect possession without achieving a perfect suppression?”

“If I let the demonic fiend refine some of the power of chaos, will I be able to achieve 100% ?”

Wang Xian kept pondering.

After that, he separated a trace of the power of chaos and let the demonic fiend refine it.

The power of chaos was a high-grade energy, one of the highest-grade energy in all living things!

Logically speaking, any powerhouse would be able to refine it.

However, no powerhouse would be able to control it!

Except for Wang Xian!

When the demonic fiend refined a trace of the power of chaos, it could only allow its body to possess such a trace of energy. It would not be able to control it.

However, by using the power of chaos, it could suppress the soul and aura of the demonic human in the embryo.

It could completely suppress or even fuse with it!
